entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
